00054 // packet format, including Ethernet-level headers
00055 struct fadc_packet
00056 {
00057   unsigned char dest_addr[6];
00058   unsigned char src_addr[6];
00059   unsigned short protocol;
00060   unsigned short content_length;
00061   unsigned char buffer_number;
00062   unsigned char admin_message;
00063   unsigned short packet_serial;
00064 };
00065 
00066 // state associated with each board
00067 const int max_boards = 256;
00068 struct fadc_board 
00069 {
00070   bool enabled;
00071   map<int, fadc_packet *> packets;
00072   int start_packet;
00073   int stop_packet;
00074   bool start_packet_seen;
00075   bool stop_packet_seen;
00076 };
00077 struct fadc_board board[max_boards];
00078 char *buf = NULL;
00079 char *bufp;

00081 void receivePackets()
00082 {
00083   while(1) {
00084     int status = recv(packet_socket, bufp, 1518, 0); 
00085     if(status < 0) {
00086       if(errno != EWOULDBLOCK && errno != EAGAIN) {
00087         perror("receivePackets");
00088       }
00089       break;
00090     }
00091 
00092 #if 0
00093     for(int i = 0; i < status; i++) {
00094       printf("%02x ", 0xff & bufp[i]);
00095     }
00096     printf("\n");
00097 #endif
00098 
00099     struct fadc_packet *pkt = (struct fadc_packet *) bufp;
00100     int board_number = pkt->src_addr[5];
00101     int content_length = ntohs(pkt->content_length);
00102     int buffer_number = pkt->buffer_number;
00103     int admin_message = pkt->admin_message;
00104     int packet_serial = ntohs(pkt->packet_serial);
00105 
00106     if(content_length > 1500) {
00107       printf("board %d length %d buffer %d admin %d serial %d\n", 
00108          board_number, content_length, buffer_number, 
00109          admin_message, packet_serial);
00110     }
00111 
00112     board[board_number].packets[packet_serial] = pkt;
00113     if(admin_message & 0x1) {
00114       board[board_number].start_packet = packet_serial;
00115       board[board_number].start_packet_seen = true;
00116     }
00117     if(admin_message & 0x2) {
00118       board[board_number].stop_packet = packet_serial;
00119       board[board_number].stop_packet_seen = true;
00120     }
00121  
00122     bufp += status;
00123 
00124     if(allPacketsReceived()) {
00125        break;
00126     }
00127 
00128   }
00129 }
00130 
00131 void forgetPackets()
00132 {
00133   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00134     if(board[i].enabled) {
00135       board[i].packets.clear();
00136       board[i].start_packet_seen = false;
00137       board[i].stop_packet_seen = false;
00138     }
00139   }
00140   bufp = buf;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool allPacketsReceived()
00144 {
00145   // check whether we have a start packet, a stop packet, and a stream of
00146   // continuous serial numbers in between.
00147   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00148     if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00149     if(!board[i].start_packet_seen || !board[i].stop_packet_seen) {
00150       //printf("Still waiting: admin %d %d %d\n", i, board[i].start_packet_seen, board[i].stop_packet_seen);
00151       return false;
00152     }
00153   }
00154   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00155     if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00156     int num_packets = board[i].stop_packet - board[i].start_packet;
00157     if(num_packets < 0) {
00158       num_packets += 0x10000;
00159     }
00160  
00161     for(int j = num_packets; j >= 0; j--) {
00162       int pn = (board[i].start_packet + j) & 0xffff;
00163       if(board[i].packets[pn] == NULL) {
00164         // printf("Still waiting: packet %d %d\n", i, j);
00165         return false; 
00166       }
00167     }
00168   }
00169   return true;
00170 }

00173 void setReg(char *if_name, int board, int fadc, int reg,
00174   unsigned long long value)
00175 {
00176   // look up the index of the interface
00177   int if_index = if_nametoindex(if_name);
00178   if(if_index < 0) {
00179     printf("Unknown interface %s\n", if_name);
00180     return;
00181   }
00182 
00183   struct ifreq req;
00184   strcpy(req.ifr_name, if_name);
00185   if(ioctl(packet_socket, SIOCGIFHWADDR, &req) < 0) {
00186     perror("SIOCGIFHWADDR");
00187     return;
00188   }
00189   unsigned char src[ETH_ALEN];
00190   memcpy(src, req.ifr_hwaddr.sa_data, ETH_ALEN);
00191 
00192   unsigned char dst[ETH_ALEN] = { 0x00, 0x12, 0x6d, 0x12, 0x34, 0xff};
00193   dst[5] = board;
00194   struct sockaddr_ll dstaddr;
00195   dstaddr.sll_family = AF_PACKET;
00196   dstaddr.sll_protocol = htons(ETH_P_ALL);
00197   dstaddr.sll_ifindex = if_index;
00198   dstaddr.sll_hatype = 0;
00199   dstaddr.sll_pkttype = 0;
00200   dstaddr.sll_halen = ETH_ALEN;
00201   memcpy(dstaddr.sll_addr, dst, ETH_ALEN);
00202 
00203   // format a packet
00204   unsigned char packet[512];
00205   memcpy(&packet[0], dst, ETH_ALEN);
00206   memcpy(&packet[6], src, ETH_ALEN);
00207 
00208   // protocol
00209   packet[12] = 0x0b;
00210   packet[13] = 0x04;
00211 
00212   // the content
00213   packet[14] = (fadc << 5) | reg;
00214   packet[15] = (value >> 56) & 0xff;
00215   packet[16] = (value >> 48) & 0xff;
00216   packet[17] = (value >> 40) & 0xff;
00217   packet[18] = (value >> 32) & 0xff;
00218   packet[19] = (value >> 24) & 0xff;
00219   packet[20] = (value >> 16) & 0xff;
00220   packet[21] = (value >>  8) & 0xff;
00221   packet[22] = (value      ) & 0xff;
00222 
00223   int packet_length = 512;
00224 
00225   if(sendto(packet_socket, packet, packet_length, 0, (const sockaddr *) &dstaddr, sizeof(dstaddr)) < 0) {
00226     perror("sendto");
00227   }
00228 }
00229 
00230 void setupRegs()
00231 {
00232   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00233 
00234     // If no settings exist for the board, disable it.
00235     if(!odb_find_key("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x", 
00236                      crate_number, i)) {
00237       board[i].enabled = false;
00238       continue;
00239     } 
00240     printf("Found board %02x\n", i);
00241 
00242     bool enabled = 
00243       odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Enabled",
00244                    crate_number, i);
00245     board[i].enabled = enabled;
00246 
00247 
00248     for(int chan = 0; chan < 8; chan++) {
00249       int led_mode = 
00250         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/LED Mode",
00251                     crate_number, i, chan);
00252 
00253       int lower_threshold = 
00254         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Lower threshold", 
00255                      crate_number, i, chan);
00256       int upper_threshold = 
00257         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Upper threshold", 
00258                     crate_number, i, chan);
00259       int pulser_period = 
00260         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Pulser period", 
00261                     crate_number, i, chan);
00262       int trigger_mask = 
00263         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Trigger mask", 
00264                     crate_number, i, chan);
00265       int presamples = 
00266         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Presamples", 
00267                     crate_number, i, chan);
00268       int stretch_samples = 
00269         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Stretch samples", 
00270                   crate_number, i, chan);
00271       int dcm_phase =
00272         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/DCM phase", 
00273                   crate_number, i, chan);
00274 
00275       if(enabled) {
00276         unsigned long long r0 = 
00277           (lower_threshold & 0xfff) |
00278           ((upper_threshold & 0xfff) << 12) |
00279           ((trigger_mask & 0xf) << 24) |
00280           ((presamples & 0xf) << 28) |
00281           (((unsigned long long) (stretch_samples & 0xff)) << 32);
00282          unsigned long long r1 =
00283            (pulser_period & 0xffffffff) |
00284            (((unsigned long long) (led_mode & 0xf)) << 32); 
00285          unsigned long long r2 = dcm_phase;
00286 
00287         int frontend = chan/2;
00288         if(frontend == 1) {
00289           frontend = 2;
00290         } else if(frontend == 2) {
00291           frontend = 1;
00292         }
00293 
00294         if(chan % 2 == 0) { 
00295           setReg("eth0", i, frontend, 0, r0);
00296           setReg("eth0", i, frontend, 1, r1);
00297           setReg("eth0", i, frontend, 4, r2);
00298         } else {
00299           setReg("eth0", i, frontend, 2, r0);
00300           setReg("eth0", i, frontend, 3, r1);
00301           setReg("eth0", i, frontend, 5, r2);
00302         }
00303       }
00304     }
00305   }
00306 }

00308 INT new_fadc_bor()
00309 {
00310     packet_socket = socket(PF_PACKET, SOCK_RAW, htons(0x0b04));
00311 
00312     if(packet_socket < 0) {
00313       perror("socket");
00314     }
00315 
00316     buf = new char[fadc_buffer_size];
00317 
00318 #if 0
00319     // set up a timeout so that recv() calls return after ~1 ms even if
00320     // there is no packet.
00321     struct timeval timeout;
00322     timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00323     timeout.tv_usec = 1000;
00324     if(setsockopt(packet_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, &timeout, sizeof(timeout)) < 0) {
00325       perror("setsockopt");
00326     }
00327 #endif
00328 #if 1
00329     // make socket non-blocking
00330     if(fcntl(packet_socket, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK)) {
00331       perror("fcntl O_NONBLOCK");
00332     }
00333 #endif
00334 
00335     setupRegs();
00336     forgetPackets();
00337 
00338     return SUCCESS;
00339 }
00340 
00341 INT new_fadc_eor()
00342 {
00343     if(buf != NULL) {
00344       delete[] buf;
00345       buf = NULL;
00346     }
00347     close(packet_socket);
00348     return SUCCESS;
00349 }
00350 
00351 INT new_fadc_poll_live()
00352 {
00353   receivePackets();
00354   return SUCCESS;
00355 }

00357 INT new_fadc_read(char *pevent)
00358 {
00359   char bk_name[80];
00360   char *pdata;
00361 
00362   bool timed_out = false;
00363   struct timeval t1, t2;
00364   gettimeofday(&t1,0);
00365   int loop_count = 0;
00366   while(!allPacketsReceived()) {
00367 //    printf("Waiting to read...\n");
00368     sched_yield();
00369     receivePackets();
00370 
00371     gettimeofday(&t2,0);
00372     double tdiff = (t2.tv_usec-t1.tv_usec) + 1000000*(t2.tv_sec-t1.tv_sec);
00373     if(tdiff > 10000 && loop_count > 10) {
00374       printf("Timed out\n");
00375       timed_out = true;
00376       break;
00377     }
00378     loop_count++;
00379   } 
00380 
00381   bk_init32(pevent);
00382 
00383   if(!timed_out) {
00384     for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00385       if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00386 
00387       for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
00388         sprintf(bk_name, "N%c%02x", 'a' + j, i);
00389         bk_create(pevent, bk_name, TID_BYTE, &pdata);
00390 
00391         int num_packets = board[i].stop_packet - board[i].start_packet;
00392         if(num_packets < 0) {
00393           num_packets += 0x10000;
00394         }
00395  
00396         for(int k = 0; k < num_packets; k++) {
00397           int pn = (board[i].start_packet + k) & 0xffff;
00398           int frontend = (board[i].packets[pn]->buffer_number - 1) / 3;
00399           if(frontend == j) { 
00400             int len = ntohs(board[i].packets[pn]->content_length);
00401             char *p = ((char *) (board[i].packets[pn])) + 20;
00402             memcpy(pdata, p, len);
00403             pdata += len;
00404           }
00405         }
00406 
00407         bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00408       }
00409     }
00410   }
00411 
00412   forgetPackets();
00413       
00414   return SUCCESS;
00415 }
